title: Getting Started with Customer Support
content: Customer support is the foundation of any successful business. It involves helping customers resolve issues, answer questions, and provide guidance on product usage.

title: Password Reset Procedures
content: To reset a password, customers should click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page, enter their email address, and follow the instructions sent to their email.

title: Shipping and Delivery Information
content: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for next-day delivery. International shipping may take 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

title: Return and Refund Policy
content: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. Original shipping costs are non-refundable.

title: Technical Troubleshooting Guide
content: Common technical issues can often be resolved by clearing browser cache, updating the app to the latest version, or restarting the device. For persistent issues, contact technical support.

title: Billing and Payment Methods
content: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Billing cycles are monthly for subscriptions. You can update payment methods in your account settings.

title: Product Warranty Information
content: All products come with a standard 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects. Extended warranties are available for purchase. Warranty claims require proof of purchase.

title: Account Security Best Practices
content: Use strong, unique passwords. Enable two-factor authentication. Never share your login credentials. Log out from shared devices. Monitor your account for suspicious activity.

title: Subscription Management
content: Manage your subscription through your account dashboard. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time. Changes take effect at the next billing cycle.

title: Contact Information and Hours
content: Customer support is available Monday-Friday 9 AM to 6 PM EST. Email support is available 24/7 with responses within 24 hours. Live chat is available during business hours.
